citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to allow access and accompany inspection at ( 3-31-2014 1pm, 3-28-2014
2pm, 3-26-2014 9:15am)
Contact me Jerry West at 240-461-9185 with a time when someone will normally be available for inspection.
